attributes.action: Convince Nestlé/Rowntree's to bring back Tooty Frooties
attributes.additional_details: The government should help persuade Nestle to bring back Tooty Frooties, Nestle shouldn't have stopped making them without warning us first and many people want them back for good, the government should consider to help us out.
attributes.background: Unfortunately Nestlé decided to discontinue Tooty Frooties back in 2019 which many people have been upset about, they were a much loved British sweet enjoyed all across the country, we would be happy if The Government could help back the campaign for the British people.

rejection.details: You may wish to contact Nestlé directly about this issue.
